title: GPT Market Research Tool
description: This tool leverages GPT technology for in-depth digital market research. It specializes in keyword analysis, competitive benchmarking, data crawling, and generating comprehensive reports. Key features include identifying commercial keywords, competitor analysis, generating project descriptions, and suggesting search keywords for pricing.

main_keyword.title: Main Keyword
main_keyword.description: Enter the main commercial keyword for research, such as 'KYC Providers'. The keyword should be highly competitive in nature.
main_keyword.error_message: Invalid keyword. Please enter a highly competitive commercial keyword.

additional_info_for_filtering_projects.title: Clarification
additional_info_for_filtering_projects.description: Create a brief description of a typical project related to the entered keyword.
additional_info_for_filtering_projects.prompt: A typical project related to the entered keyword is

serp_prices_ext.title: Serp Prices Ext
serp_prices_ext.description: Suggest a keyword for searching pricing pages, like 'Prices' or 'Fees'.
serp_prices_ext.defauult: (Prices | Fees | Plans | Costs | Pricing | Cost | Price)

completion_message: Your research request has been initiated. The process typically takes 10-20 minutes but can extend up to 2 hours. Please check the status after 20 minutes.
